title: Social Event Integration APIs – Integration with Third-Party Social Platforms
summary: As a developer, I want to access APIs that allow integration with third-party social platforms so that I can create applications that facilitate social engagement for elderly users and enhance their connection with caregivers and family.

title: Engagement Analytics Tools – Insights into User Preferences and Interests
summary: As a developer, I want to access engagement analytics tools that provide insights into user preferences and interests, so that I can create tailored applications that enhance social inclusion for elderly users and caregivers.

title: Communication Facilitation Features – APIs for Messaging and Video Calls
summary: As a developer, I want robust APIs for messaging and video calls so that I can create applications that enhance communication between elderly users and their caregivers, promoting social inclusion and engagement.

title: Customizable User Profiles for Enhanced Engagement
summary: As a developer, I want to create customizable user profiles that allow elderly users to specify their interests and hobbies so that the ALFRED system can recommend relevant social activities and foster meaningful connections with their peers.

title: Event Notification and Reminder Systems - API Access
summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want to have API access for third-party apps to send alerts for social events and reminders, so that I can create user-friendly notifications that help elderly users stay connected and engaged with their caregivers and social circles.

title: User Feedback and Rating Mechanisms
summary: As a developer, I want a mechanism to collect user feedback and ratings for the applications I create on the ALFRED platform so that I can improve the user experience and ensure that my applications meet the needs of elderly users and their caregivers.

title: Resource Sharing Capabilities
summary: As a developer, I want to access APIs that facilitate sharing local resources and activities, so that I can create applications that enhance social engagement for elderly users and improve their connection with caregivers and communities.
